alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 9:27AM EST until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor remains in Minor Flood stage. Northerly winds through early this week and again into late this week may slow or halt the decline, and may even cause brief small rises. It is then forecast to continue a very slow fall through Minor Flood stage. Residents and interests along the river will continue to see lowering river levels and improving flood conditions. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 2.3 feet, Minor flooding of low lying streets and yards north of Fox Road on Lake County side of Astor, and from River Road northward on Volusia side of river. Water begins to cover docks at South Moon Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Sunday the stage was 2.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EST Sunday was 2.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 2.5 feet early this morning. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.5 Sun 7 pm 2.5 2.4 2.4 2.3 2.3 &&
